name: δ^\*\_μ
label: μ-δ-adjoint
definition: Adjoint of δ with respect to μ-weighted inner product.
correction\_term: G\_μ(X) encodes the effect of gradients of μ.

constraints.limit\_condition: δ^\*\_μ → δ\* when μ is constant.
constraints.compatibility: Consistent with μ-weighted divergence and integration by parts.
